summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganThe about-face Fractal Glitter Eye Paint long-wear shimmer and glitter collection goes on velvety smooth, serving luster and vibrant color with none of the fallout or stickiness.
details: DetailsBenefitsA shimmer-loaded, smooth mousse eyeshadow that doesn't crease, crack, transfer or fallout.Long-wearing, water-resistant, no-smudgeExperiment with new eye paint, lipstick and brow products that are filled with super-fine, celestial sparkle and come in a range of pigment-loaded hues.VeganItem 2608411How To UseDab softly onto lids and around eyes with applicator, brush or fingers. Formula allows play time to blend---let it dry before layering.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Pentylene Glycol, Cetearyl Olivate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed OiI, SiIica, Sorbitan Olivate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Propanediol, Sodium Polyacrylate; 1,2-Hexanediol, Acrylates Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Kaolin, Laureth-21, Laureth-50, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tin Oxide, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Iron Oxides (CI 77499)]
how_to_use: Dab softly onto lids and around eyes with applicator, brush or fingers. Formula allows play time to blend---let it dry before layering.

reviews.headline: I get so many compliments!
reviews.comments: I lovvvve this. Going to have to get another color or 5. Pigment is good. Stays on ALL day. I put in on around 6am and don't take it off till I was my face at around 9pm

reviews.headline: I can't get the stupid applicator to grab any product.
reviews.comments: This was a HUGE waste of money - I bought 2 shades recommended by the Ulta employee because she insisted it was humidity-proof. Yes, the colours are gorgeous but..... The applicator is the WORST. it won't grab product - even if I store it upside down (guess the formula is too thick to move) and you can't circle the wand around the sides because of the plastic insert. So I popped the insert out, depotted them in an attempt to make it work, and they dried up in days. This has to be one of the WORST vessel designs I have ever encountered. You can see in my photo the applicator is nearly clean. Super frustrating.

reviews.headline: Pretty but not perfect
reviews.comments: I love the color, it applies well and lasts all day. Unfortunately, I keep having an allergic reaction to it. I dont have sensitive skin and dont normally have reactions to make up but this makes me eyelids swell and itch so bad. The packaging is also terrible. You barely get any product and I think after a few weeks of daily use, you wouldnt be able to scrape anymore product out. I still would recommend because not everyone will have a reaction and its great if you want to use it sometimes so itll last!

reviews.headline: Good and not so good
reviews.comments: I got these in Smolder and Fracture. I love both colors, although I end up getting glitter outside of the application area.  I dropped a star because, as others have noted, the container seems almost empty. You habe to really scrape the sides to get any product on the wand. I'm storing these upside down to see of that helps. The colors are beautiful though

reviews.headline: I would purchase and share with a friend!
reviews.comments: This was a beautiful color!

reviews.headline: Good and Bad
reviews.comments:
The makeup quality is usually very good, it is fast driving so you have to move fast. It does last all with no smudging and minimal to no creasing (provided you don't also have oil based products layered with it). However, I did get one bottle that came with loose "hairs" possibly from a faulty made wand(I threw it away to be safe).
Some of the colors are spot on with what's represented on the packaging. However, there are a few such as "Tin Pan Alley" that do not match. with that color. I was expecting a pale gold color but what I got was still pale but it had a lot of green.
Unfortunately the packaging is very wasteful, and I'm not talking about all the plastic boxes but rather that unless you cut it open, you won't be able to access most of the makeup. 
Quantity, they do not regulate consistent amounts. Most of the eye paints I purchased years ago had much more product. But also of the ones I recently purchased together, one had significantly less product.

reviews.headline: YES
reviews.comments: Such a gorgeous shimmer and easy to apply!!

reviews.headline: shade: all about the benjamins
reviews.comments: product was so dried up/dry upon purchase that I could not even get enough out to try it out. container was sealed so either it dries way too fast or I received a bad product. either way, not worth the almost 45 minute drive to the store  to return imo.

reviews.headline: Color "Next Caller"
reviews.comments: I was instantly confused on how it seemed empty. It was hard to get paint on the brand new brush. Had to vigorously jab the stick in to see if i could get it wet. I got just enough on and was able to apply nicely- very eye catching and pretty for sure! Love the color i chose (Next Caller). Im just not thrilled with the challenge of getting all my moneys worth and fighting to get paint out. I know its there but something about the container is not user friendly.

reviews.headline: Stunning, pow!
reviews.comments: I wore this as a statement eyeshadow for the Cowboy Carter tour and oh wow. This made my entire outfit. The pigment payoff and durability is insane. Like a beautiful punch of blue with metallic. It can be a little tricky to apply evenly, but I applied in layers and just kept smoothing with my finger. Its amazing this is just one eyeshadow given it creates an entire look.

reviews.headline: This is STUNNING
reviews.comments: I love love love this product. I have never really gived liquid eyeshadows a try but had been looking for a glittery shadow without the fallout and decided to try this out. The glitter payoff in this Fractal Eye Paint is insane, it's super comfortable on the eyes and is weightless. I applied it directly to my eyelid and blended out with my finger. Theres no fallout and you can't even feel the glitter flakes.

reviews.headline: This is STUNNING
reviews.comments: I love love love this product. I have never really gived liquid eyeshadows a try but had been looking for a glittery shadow without the fallout and decided to try this out. The glitter payoff in this Fractal Eye Paint is insane, it's super comfortable on the eyes and is weightless. I applied it directly to my eyelid and blended out with my finger. Theres no fallout and you can't even feel the glitter flakes.

reviews.headline: I would have loved it more BUT
reviews.comments:
Beautiful idea, color, and packaging. 
It IS patchy. Took me a long time to spread it out evenly and I had to use my fingers. Even then, there were still spaces on my eyelid where the shadow would not stay on (I prepped my eyelid before as well).

reviews.headline: Dried out very quickly
reviews.comments: I loved the color and the impact was WOW.  If I wrote this review when I first got this, I would easily give it 5-stars, but it's been 10 months later and with only using it a handful of times, it is completely dried out.  I cannot get any product using the applicator.  I was able to smush and smear what was on the applicator to my finger to apply whatever was left on there, but cannot get anything else.  It was screwed on securely and I have never had this issue with any other brand's similar product.  Maybe it's the packaging, but I'm disappointed I didn't get to use this more than a handful of times.

reviews.headline: Too itchy for sensitive eyes
reviews.comments: Bought this after liking their holographic equivalent. Unfortunately the ingredients are slightly different and this one made my eyes very itchy and irritated. The application was also much more patchy than the other one. I would NOT recommend this to anyone and will be throwing away.

reviews.headline: Thank you Halsey
reviews.comments: I really do love these little glittery guys.

reviews.headline: Amazing product
reviews.comments: Bought this for my prom makeup and looked absolutely stunning. It was very pigmented and lasted me through the night. Absolutely stunning

reviews.headline: Does out too quick!
reviews.comments: I've tried pretty much all of the glitter shadows out there in this wand format and this one ranks close to the bottom because it dries out so quickly. I used it twice before it dried out, lasted a month. I find that most glitter shadows last about a year so it was very disappointing. If the packaging or formula were more suited to last, this is actually a pretty topper when applied sparingly! The value is just not there.

reviews.headline: Glitter Glam
reviews.comments: Decided to give this a try after seeing it being used by a beauty creator on TikTok. Easy to apply, stays on all day, and I don't feel it on my lids like other glitter eye paints I've used. I'll definitely be purchasing  it again.

reviews.headline: Oily lids-friendly
reviews.comments: A little goes a long way, and it holds up to my oily eyelids. It blends easily with no tugging. It's my first favorite discovery of 2025! I plan to try more products from About Face.

media.headline: I can't get the stupid applicator to grab any product.
media.caption: I hate this applicator it doesn't pick up product. Total waste of money.

media.headline: ONLY if they change the packaging!
media.caption: ALL THIS PRODUCT left inside!

media.headline: ONLY if they change the packaging!
media.caption: thick

faceoff_positive.comments: My god Ms. Frangipane (& team) you've really done it this time! This was my first about-face order, I was super excited to try! I had heard that these products were great quality especially at the price point and those reviews were NOT lying! I tried this fractal glitter eye paint (apollo) in-store at ulta just to check color and consistency and while the tester was a little bit dried out it still blended out beautifully on the back of my hand and the shimmer was breathtaking, not to mention I absolutely loved the color! I immediately had to order it! The product will seem dry-ish when it comes out but trust me, it's not! In terms of wear on the eyes, I'd say this blends out best using your fingertips as opposed to a brush (though that may just be me), and it has fantastic stay power! I tend to have particularly oily eyelids in combination with hooded eyes so if you're like me I'd recommend using a tacky primer base for your eye makeup and a good setting spray, but otherwise this is a 100/10 product for me!! The only real downside to this is the packaging, you can't see how much is left and I don't think that the doe-foot applicator is necessarily the best for picking up and depositing the product given its consistency, but again I absolutely love this product otherwise and I'll recommend it to anyone who will listen!! THANK YOU HALSEY & TEAM
faceoff_positive.headline: I'M IN LOVE üíõ‚ú®Ô∏è

faceoff_negative.comments:
Look‚Ä¶I have LOTS of AF products and I'm a huge fan. The old packaging was cumbersome to store and bulky, but the applicator was superior to this one. I've had to return two different shades because the applicator and this formula doesn't jive well. I'm not sure why. It's the same packaging as the matte fluid eye paint and lip paint, but it's more of a doe foot shaped tip. The prior packaging was able to get plenty of product on the wand, however, the revamp has a hard time getting plenty of product out of the package. Thus, you're not able to fully experience the genius of this product because you're too busy fumbling around with the applicator trying to get it covered with product. If you can get your hands on the older packaging, you'll really experience what this product can do. 

Now that that's out of the way, I have nearly every shade in both the old and new packaging. The formula is a gorgeous "whipped mousse" lightweight gel-like feel with very finely milled glitter with pigment mixed in. You can't go wrong with Above Santorini, a gorgeous jewel toned deep teal blue with teal and blue glitter. However, if you're more of a neutral fan, you'll dig shades like fracture and digital demise. There's a beautiful soft silver in this collection and the gold is stunning as well. All the shades are really beautiful and unique. Once this product sets, it's not going anywhere until you take it off. No flaking, fading, cracking, etc etc. I just wish the new applicator delivered the product as well as its former version.
faceoff_negative.headline: The new applicator sucks! INCREDIBLE product.
